text: @CurtisHouck @PressSec @kayleighmcenany @newsbusters Kayleigh, you spin facts so fast you make me dizzy. Racism is racism. "Kung Flu" is a racial slur. The "President" could merely have said Covid19 or coronavirus. You are lying more & more daily for the Godless man. Smh
